pages.text: A demonic rite used as protection or traps.$(br)By creating a modified form of a warp point held under tension, one can allow burning horrors from the $(marked)Infernal Kingdom$() to enter this reality $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro#triggered_rites)$(t:Triggered Rites)once a living being passes nearby the rite$(), or upon simple activation. It will release waves of these demonic monsters to destroy those nearby.
